name: property_based_kata
description: An introduction to property-based testing in javascript.

scripts.test-chpillade: while inotifywait -e modify chpillade.js test.js generators.js; do ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test_chpillade.js ; done
scripts.test-strings: while inotifywait -e modify 2_strings.js test_strings.js generators.js; do ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test_strings.js ; done

author: chpill
